Hotel.name: The Pattaya Discovery Beach Hotel Pattaya

Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at The Pattaya Discovery Beach Hotel Pattaya, you'll be centrally located in Pattaya, steps from Pattaya Beach and minutes from Hard Rock Cafe. This 4-star hotel is within close proximity of Pattaya International Hospital and Alcazar Cabaret.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 164 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars. Rooms have private balconies. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with separate bathtubs and showers feature hair dryers and bathrobes.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Be sure to enjoy recreational amenities including a health club and an outdoor pool. Additional features include complimentary wireless Internet access, babysitting/childcare, and a television in the lobby.

Dining
Enjoy a satisfying meal at a restaurant serving guests of The Pattaya Discovery Beach Hotel Pattaya. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a business center, limo/town car service, and dry cleaning/laundry services. Event facilities at this hotel consist of conference space and a meeting room. A roundtrip airport shuttle is available for a surcharge.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is noon
Enjoy a satisfying meal at a restaurant serving guests of The Pattaya Discovery Beach Hotel Pattaya. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Pattaya Beach - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi
Hard Rock Cafe - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Pattaya International Hospital - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Alcazar Cabaret - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Central Festival Shopping Center - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Art in Paradise - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Pattaya Memorial Hospital - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
Tiffany's Show - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Central Festival Pattaya Beach - 0.9 km / 0.5 mi
World Gems Collection - 1.2 km / 0.7 mi
Pattaya City Hall - 1.2 km / 0.8 mi
Royal Garden Plaza - 1.6 km / 1 mi
Ripley's Believe It or Not - 1.7 km / 1 mi
Tuxedo Magic Theatre - 1.9 km / 1.2 mi
King Power Duty Free Mall - 2 km / 1.3 mi

The preferred airport for The Pattaya Discovery Beach Hotel Pattaya is Bangkok (BKK-Suvarnabhumi Intl.) - 84.2 km / 52.3 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

The preferred airport for The Pattaya Discovery Beach Hotel Pattaya is Bangkok (BKK-Suvarnabhumi Intl.) - 84.1 km / 52.3 mi.
